title: Papua New Guinea: 40 Years of Independence
abstract: Presenting an historical record of documentary films about Papua New Guinea, from the NFSA, Film Australia Collection.
description: Australia has had strong links to the nation known today as Papua New Guinea. Numerous Australian films have explored aspects of its culture and landscapes, including a rich body of works produced by Film Australia. This package of eight documentary films made between the 1940s and the mid-1960s represent a record of its people, landscapes and colonial influence.
